articles.title: Doomsday Glacier's Ticking Clock: Satellites Reveal “Vigorous Melting” Beneath Antarctica's Thwaites Glacier - SciTechDaily
articles.description: Satellite radar data shows substantial seawater intrusion beneath Antarctica's Thwaites Glacier, causing ice to rise and fall. Using high-resolution satellite radar data, a team of glaciologists led by researchers at the University of California, Irvine uncov…
articles.content: A team led by glaciologists at UC Irvine used satellite radar data to reconstruct the impact of warm ocean water surging in a grounding zone extending several kilometers beneath Thwaites Glacier in W… [+8246 chars]
